ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Conflict-managed urban heat mitigation portfolio balancing climate, mobility, and economic goals.

bullets.item: Tree canopy targets near heat-vulnerable corridors.
Reflective surfaces with glare and safety mitigations.
Transit priority and zoning tweaks aligned to equity goals.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Canopy expansion with maintenance funding and survival targets.
Transit priority lanes with micromobility integration.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Economic impact screening and phased zoning adjustments.
